member.name: CMSG_MAIL_LIST_RECIPIENT_INFO
member.summary: The CMSG_MAIL_LIST_RECIPIENT_INFO structure contains information used for previously distributed symmetric key-encryption keys (KEK).

member.name: CMSG_MAIL_LIST_RECIPIENT_INFO.dwVersion
member.summary: Indicates the version of the structure. This member is always four.

member.name: CMSG_MAIL_LIST_RECIPIENT_INFO.KeyId
member.summary: A CRYPT_DATA_BLOB structure that identifies a symmetric key-encryption key previously distributed to the sender and one or more recipients.

member.name: CMSG_MAIL_LIST_RECIPIENT_INFO.KeyEncryptionAlgorithm
member.summary: that identifies the key-encryption algorithm and any associated parameters used to encrypt the content encryption key.

member.name: CMSG_MAIL_LIST_RECIPIENT_INFO.EncryptedKey
member.summary: A CRYPT_DATA_BLOB structure that contains the encrypted content encryption key.

member.name: CMSG_MAIL_LIST_RECIPIENT_INFO.Date
member.summary: Optional. When present, this member specifies a single key-encryption key from a previously distributed set.

member.name: CMSG_MAIL_LIST_RECIPIENT_INFO.pOtherAttr
member.summary: Optional pointer to a structure containing additional information.
